plot: Nenos Shmoon is a man who spends his days and nights in the streets of Amsterdam working as a Christian missionary, trying to spread a message and engaging in arguments with people he encounters.
title: Walking with Nenos
plot_es: Nenos Shmoon is a man who spends his days and nights in the streets of Amsterdam working as a Christian missionary, trying to spread a message and engaging in arguments with people he encounters.
plot_en: Nenos Shmoon is a man who spends his days and nights in the streets of Amsterdam working as a Christian missionary, trying to spread a message and engaging in arguments with people he encounters.
